short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't buy things when it's late! This extension disables buttons on Amazon necessary for making purchases between midnight and 8 AM.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't buy things when it's late! This extension disables buttons on Amazon necessary for making purchases between midnight and 8 AM.
